docs.snippet: Republican delegates neared approval of a party platform that is staunchly conservative in matters of gender, sexuality and marriage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican delegates neared approval of a party platform that is staunchly conservative in matters of gender, sexuality and marriage.
docs.abstract: Republican National Committee has drafted platform that reflects views of presumptive presidential nominee Donald Trump on issues like national defense and immigration, but moves sharply right on social issues like gay rights and religion; lack of interference by Trump or his aides has allowed conservative activists greater influence in drafting platform.

headline.main: Emerging Republican Platform Goes Far to the Right
headline.print_headline: Republicans Draft Platform That Reflects Trump, Then Heads to the Right

docs.snippet: Entirely absent are young officeholders who by virtue of their background or political biography, or the states they represented, seemed primed to expand the party’s electoral horizons....
docs.lead_paragraph: Entirely absent are young officeholders who by virtue of their background or political biography, or the states they represented, seemed primed to expand the party’s electoral horizons.
docs.abstract: Political Memo; Donald J Trump hones list of possible running mates to slim few, including Indiana Gov Mike Pence and former House Speaker Newt Gingrich; Trump's advisers dismiss suggestion he seek female or non-white running mate to broaden his appeal, and instead look for someone who can help him navigate legislative branch.

headline.main: G.O.P.’s Brightest Stars Not in the Mix as Donald Trump Picks a Running Mate
headline.print_headline: G.O.P.’s Stars Not in Mix as Trump Picks No. 2

docs.snippet: The Indiana governor, who is popular with religious conservatives, appeared with Mr. Trump at a rally near Indianapolis....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Indiana governor, who is popular with religious conservatives, appeared with Mr. Trump at a rally near Indianapolis.
docs.abstract: Gov Mike Pence of Indiana prepares for possible role as vice presidential running mate for Donald J Trump; Republicans close to Trump agree Pence is low-risk choice, and Trump has praised him as successful governor who is known and respected in Washington.

headline.main: Mike Pence Takes Turn Auditioning for Role as Donald Trump’s Running Mate
headline.print_headline: Indiana Governor Has His Audition for Ticket

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Westfield, and Alexander Burns from New York

docs.snippet: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg of the Supreme Court was rebuked by Donald J. Trump for voicing comments against him that he said were “beneath the court.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg of the Supreme Court was rebuked by Donald J. Trump for voicing comments against him that he said were “beneath the court.”
docs.abstract: Donald Trump calls United States Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg disgrace to court and demands she apologize after interview in which she voiced harsh criticism of his candidacy; legal experts call Ginsberg's criticism unwise and inappropriate, saying such comments could potentially damage court's integrity.

headline.main: Donald Trump Calls Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s Remarks a ‘Disgrace to the Court’
headline.print_headline: Trump Calls Ginsburg ‘a Disgrace to the Court’
